The T34 Emulator.

Main

Entry point for the T34 emulator program.

Parameters:args – command line arguments.

Argument Parser

Parses the command line arguments.

Emulator – auto members¶

class t34.Emulator.Emulator(program_name=None)[source]¶

Class to store an emulator and runs program files.

access_memory(address)[source]¶

Accesses the memory address and displays the contents.

Parameters:address – HEX address of the memory to be accessed.
access_memory_range(begin, end)[source]¶

Accesses a memory range and displays all the contents.

Parameters:
  • begin – beginning HEX address of the memory to be accessed.
  • end – end HEX address of the memory to be accessed.
edit_memory(address, data)[source]¶

Edits the contents of a specific memory address.

Parameters:
  • address – HEX address of the memory to be edited.
  • data – data to store into the memory address.
load_program()[source]¶

Loads the program.

Returns:successful read
Return type:bool
run_program(address)[source]¶

Runs and executes the program.

start_emulator()[source]¶

Starts the emulator.
